name: Pegasus/Monster D
text:
Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 1 Tribute to Normal Summon. (or Set) Up to Twice per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field or in either Graveyard; equip that target to this card. Gains ATK/DEF equal to the combined ATK/DEF of the monsters equipped to it by this effect.

-I Summon "Relinquished"!-

Hidden Effect
Cannot be destroyed by battle, also any battle damage you take from battles involving this card is also inflicted to your opponent.
